text:
🥺🥺

I'm afraid they would never get it! The vision was always going to be too great for them, too powerful for their minds. 'BLACK IS KING' is always going to be unfathomable to them; 'THE GIFT' is always going to be incomprehensible to them.

I don't fully understand, myself, what either means to me, but I know that they mean something...because they moved me on an almost spiritual, ethereal scale; because they stimulated the neurons in the deepest recesses of my mind, the neurons I didn't know even existed: until I experienced 'THE GIFT' and 'BLACK IS KING'! I was inspired. I AM inspired. I WILL always be inspired.

Thank you Beyoncé. Thank you to the artists that worked on this celestial project, which strengthens bonds and threads we didn't know existed (or the ones we have long ignored); and which lights afresh and bright the memories we didn't know we harboured (or the ones we have always longed to recall)

Know when and or where to go. Big fish in a little pond to a little fish in a big ocean. Its just when it is time to move on. That or when it is time to spring (forward). I overheat during that season. I need popsicles to cool me down. Blanket to keep me warm. Opened window to let some fresh air in. Although Im always puking my guts out first day. text: @Beyonce, I don't know what to tell you. You have no idea how much I love you. Your look literally resurrected my spirit. You know what I mean? You know your song "Partition"? You just have a look by the side of your face, ooooooh my god. This look alone gave me strength to face all the low self esteem I was facing in my bad relationships and school failure and mental illness. Your fierceness made me feel, "as long as Beyonce looks this look, I will conquer the world". I ended all my unhealthy relationships. I finished school (I studied Medicine). And I am recovering from my Bipolar. All just because of how I saw your look and fierceness. I don't know how to explain it to you, but you are cute and beautiful and kind and humble and strong and your voice is unbelievable and your dance moves can turn the whole earth dancing, combine all that and give me the fierce look, then It becomes a piece of cake for me to conquer not just the world, but my inner demons. Thank you for being Beyonce. I know you are a mam now. Just enjoy your life. You deserve all the best. You have done a great job. Relax and enjoy.
